title: Kesha: My Crazy Beautiful Life
resume: Ke$ha: My Crazy Beautiful Life is an American reality documentary television series on MTV. The series premiered on April 23, 2013 and was announced by Ke$ha during the series debut of Nikki & Sara Live. It was announced on July 26, 2013, that the series has been renewed for a second season. Season 2 will premiere on October 30, 2013.
